episodes.title: Broken Families - 11
episodes.description: Anthony is heartbroken. He has seen his family just once since he left the Twelve Tribes community in Kansas last year. But when he tries to reach out to them, he realises his worst fears have been confirmed. We look to the past to learn what the group has done to other parents who couldn't stay inside the Community, and what it's all got to do with the extraordinary story of the Twelve Tribes meeting Jerry Springer. episodes.title: Going, Going, Gone - 10
episodes.description: The Tribes are selling two of their most important pieces of real estate, raising questions about their future in Australia. Meanwhile, police send human remains found on one of the Tribes’ properties to the Coroner. Answers to some crucial questions could be closer than ever. If you have any tips or information, contact us on insidethetribe@gmail.com  Music credits: Theme: Twisted by Kevin MacLeod Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/4552-twisted License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Firesong by Kevin MacLeod Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/3759-firesong License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Artist website: https://incompetech.com Total Happy Up And Sunny by Sascha Ende Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/555-total-happy-up-and-sunny  License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license  Satiate - only percussion by Kevin MacLeod Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/4320-satiate-only-percussion License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Artist website: https://incompetech.com Enter the Maze by Kevin MacLeod Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/3712-enter-the-maze License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Artist website: https://incompetech.com Sound Effects - Outdoor Market, Small Crowd Ambience Suvaco do Cristo by Kevin MacLeod Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/4449-suvaco-do-cristo License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Artist website: https://incompetech.com The Orders Theme - Myuu - thedarkpiano.comSee omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Bonus Episode #3
episodes.description: For Sale signs have been cropping up outside the 12 Tribes properties and businesses in Australia. So what does it mean? And does this have anything to do with The Race? Tim has been getting some new tips - and some of it is downright bizarre. If you want to get in touch with us email insidethetribepod@gmail.com  Theme: Twisted by Kevin MacLeod Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/4552-twisted License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license   Warm Sunset by MusicLFiles Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/8070-warm-sunset  License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license    The Question Is (Quizpackage) by Sascha Ende Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/228-the-question-is-quizpackage License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Artist website: https://www.sascha-ende.de   Asian Drums by Kevin MacLeod  Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/3386-asian-drums  License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license  Artist website: https://incompetech.comSee omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Introducing The Confession
episodes.description: Hi it's Tim here from Inside the Tribe with another great podcast recommendation. The Confession is an astonishing story about how Melbourne detectives broke all the rules in their quest to convict a woman called Katia Pyliotis, who'd been accused of bludgeoning a man to death. Richard Baker tells the story of a murder, a botched trial and the system that allowed it to happen. Check it out Listen to The Confession hereSee omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Introducing One Minute Remaining
episodes.description: Hi it's Tim from Inside the Tribe here, I've found a great new podcast called One Minute Remaining that I've been enjoying. Jack Laurence is the host and he interviews different men and women incarcerated in the United States for a range of different crimes. It's not about whether these people are guilty or innocent, Jack just allows them to share their stories. Check out the trailer. Listen to One Minute Remaining hereSee omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Inside the Tribe Bonus Episode 2
episodes.description: We pick up from Bonus Episode 1: Tor is the last of her siblings to leave the community in \ in a dramatic dash in December 2022. She tells Tim about recent times inside and her insights are very interesting.. episodes.title: Inside the Tribe Bonus Episode 1
episodes.description: You met Oz, Suvav and Rivkah in season one of Inside the Tribe. But we didn't give you the details of how the siblings and their partners banded together to pull Rivkah and her family out in mid 2022. We flew out to meet them, to see what their life is like after decades inside a cult. Image: Suvav, Mary and their kids, three years after leaving the 12 Tribes. episodes.title: The Race - 09
episodes.description: Subscribe to listen to this episode now, or listen to it for free from 17 Jan 2022. The unthinkable has happened, so what will the Tribes do now? The countdown to the end of days has begun - will a new leader rise from the shadows? And what will become of his flock in the meantime? episodes.title: Chattanooga Days - 04
episodes.description: Subscribe to listen to this episode now, or listen to it for free from 13 Dec 2022. Born in the Deep South, Elbert Eugene Spriggs has tried his hand at just about everything. Business, teaching, the army, and marriage - all with little success. Then God comes calling on a California beach. He starts a tiny church, in 1972, with just a handful of true believers. But not everyone gets on board with his grand plan. episodes.title: The Farm - 01
episodes.description: Listen to this episode now for free, subscribe to binge the entire season. It’s 1996, and a young couple, Mark and Rose, have just returned to Sydney from living overseas. They are in love, with two beautiful kids, but at a loose end. One day, at a local fair, Mark meets a woman from a group called the Twelve Tribes. She promises him utopia, but to enter this new life, the family must leave everything behind. episodes.title: The Manual - 02

Mark and Rose have found a home in the community, and are given new names, new clothes, and a new set of rules. But there is a lot to learn, from the way they raise their children to the food they eat. Then, tragedy strikes. episodes.title: Inside the Tribe - Trailer
episodes.description: It’s 1996, and a young couple, Mark and Rose, have just returned to Sydney from living overseas. They are in love, with two beautiful kids, but they are at a loose end. One day at a local fair, they come across a Christian sect called the 12 Tribes.  The group, who live in seclusion, offer a utopia of love, peace and communal living, beholden only to the word of Yashua. But before long, Mark and Rose find themselves in a world of bizarre rituals and extreme beliefs, under the influence of a charismatic leader. They are made virtual slaves, the family shuffled around the world to prevent them escaping. So who are the 12 Tribes, and how has their leader managed to build a global following, unchecked for 50 years? Coming 29 November 2022 Have a tip of information about 12 Tribes? We’re listening! Email us at insidethetribepod@gmail.com If any of the contents in this episode have caused distress, know that there is help available via Lifeline on 13 11 14 or Beyond Blue on 1300 22 4636 Listen to Seasons 2 to 3 of the Nurse Podcast hereSee omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
